bibl.title: P. Oxy. 4458: Poseidonios.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXV, 4458 provides us with a text of Poseidonios, discussing the flooding of the Nile and drawing on pseudo-Aristotle in col. i [cf. Rainer JAKOBI und Wolfgang LUPPE, P. Oxy. 4458 col. I: Aristoteles redivivus, ZPE 131 (2000) pp. 15-18]. Critical notes.
bibl.seg: FOWLER Robert L., P. Oxy. 4458: Poseidonios.

P. Oxy. LXV, 4458 provides us with a text of Poseidonios, discussing the flooding of the Nile and drawing on pseudo-Aristotle in col. i [cf. Rainer JAKOBI und Wolfgang LUPPE, P. Oxy. 4458 col. I: Aristoteles redivivus, ZPE 131 (2000) pp. 15-18]. Critical notes.
